CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oversized Loads relative to Automotive Parts?
SRP.A: Oversized Loads is {above} Automotive Parts in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Automotive Parts relative to E-Commerce Parcels?
SRP.A: Automotive Parts is {below} E-Commerce Parcels in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Same-Day Couriers relative to Oversized Loads?
SRP.A: Same-Day Couriers is {below} Oversized Loads in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total on-time delivery rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {E-Commerce Parcels}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total on-time delivery rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Same-Day Couriers}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Oversized Loads's minimum On-Time Delivery Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Oversized Loads's minimum On-Time Delivery Rate is in {2018}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Oversized Loads's maximum On-Time Delivery Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Oversized Loads's maximum On-Time Delivery Rate is in {2002}.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2013, was the average total On-Time Delivery Rate higher or lower than between 2006 and 2016?
NC.A: The average total on-time delivery rate between 2003 and 2013 was {higher} than between 2006 and 2016.

NC.Q: Between 2019 and 2020, did the total On-Time Delivery Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2002 and 2019?
NC.A: The change in total on-time delivery rate between 2019 and 2020 was {smaller} than between 2002 and 2019.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2019, was the average total On-Time Delivery Rate higher or lower than between 2009 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total on-time delivery rate between 2004 and 2019 was {lower} than between 2009 and 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total On-Time Delivery Rate in 2007 higher or lower than in 2018?
NC.A: The total on-time delivery rate in 2007 was {higher} than in 2018.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Automotive Parts} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Oversized Loads and E-Commerce Parcels first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Oversized Loads and E-Commerce Parcels first exchanged leading positions in {2004}.
